localization.USERGUIDE.title: Finding the userguide
localization.USERGUIDE.description: System compendia and finding the userguide
localization.USERGUIDE.SidebarContent:
The right-hand Sidebar contains a lot of useful tools and is where you'll store Documents like Actors, Items, Scenes, Journal Entries, and a lot more.

It is organized into a set of tabs you can switch between. You can right click a tab to pop it out into a floating window.
localization.USERGUIDE.CompendiumPacksContent:
The Ars Magica system has some compendium packs of interest and one of them contains the user guide.

Let's explore what is available.
